name: A pair of black silk gloves
data: It increases the users strength unnoticably.
It increases the users dexterity unnoticably.
It increases the users constitution unnoticably.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration a tiny bit.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration pathetically.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
